text: K Movies Pinoy is a 24-hour Filipino cable channel owned by Viva Entertainment. It broadcasts Tagalog-dubbed Korean films 24/7. Most of the films broadcast in the channel are action films but also showcases other genres including romance, thriller, horror and drama as well.https://kmpinoy.com.ph/ ==References== Category:Viva Entertainment Category:Television in the Philippines Category:Movie channels in the Philippines Category:Filipino-language television stations Category:Television channels and stations established in 2019 Category:2019 establishments in the Philippines
title: K Movies Pinoy
